explicitMods: 23% Chance to gain a Charge when you Kill an Enemy
equipment.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refill at [Wells|Wells] or by killing monsters.

skills.secDescrText: Applies a socketed [Mark] Skill to a nearby unmarked Enemy every few seconds. [Consume|Consuming] socketed [Mark|Marks] will cause them to be reapplied to an unmarked Enemy. This reapplication can happen at most once every half second.

stats: Applies a socketed [Mark] to 1 Enemy every five seconds
Applies socketed [Mark|Marks] to Enemies within 4 metres
Supported Skills will [Mark] another Enemy within 4 Metres of [Mark|Marked] Enemy when [Consume|Consumed]

skills.descrText: Place one or more Skill Gems into this Meta Gem's sockets in the Skills Panel. The socketed Skills will be incorporated into the Meta Gem's effect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: [Mark] a target. The next [Critical|Critical Hit] the target receives [Consume|Consumes] the [Mark] to deal extra damage and grant you a [Charges|Frenzy Charge].

stats: Next [Critical|Critical Hit] against Marked Enemy has 38% increased [CriticalDamageBonus|Critical Damage Bonus]

socketedItems.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that can generate [Charges], giving them a chance to generate an additional [Charges|Charge] when they do so.

stats:
Supported Skills have 30% chance to
grant an additional [Charges|Charge]

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: While active, [Shatter|Shattering] an enemy with a non-[Herald] [Attack] [HitDamage|Hit] will cause an icy explosion that deals [Attack|Attack] damage to surrounding enemies.
skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, making it larger.

stats: Supported Skills have 35% increased Area of Effect

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.
Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: Passively coalesces icy missiles from the air over time. Using the skill fires a missile, firing an additional missile for each that has been accumulated. Fires an additional missile, up to its current missile count, targeting each [IceFragment|Ice Fragment] in its Area of effect, causing the [IceFragment|Fragments] to [DetonationTime|Detonate] immediately.
skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports [Attack] Skills, causing them to create [IceFragment|Ice Fragments] on killing [Frozen] Enemies. Cannot Support [Totem] Skills and does not modify Skills used by [Minion|Minions].

stats: Supported Skills trigger Ice Fragments on killing [Frozen] Enemies

pages.description: Explodes to deal [Cold] Damage in an area after a short delay, based on the life of the slain frozen Enemy.
stats: Deals 10% of [Frozen] target's Maximum Life as [Cold] Damage

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: Fire a hail of arrows into the air, causing them to rain from above. [Consume|Consumes] your [Charges|Frenzy Charges] to fire more arrows.

stats: Fires 100% more Arrows if a [Charges|Frenzy Charge] was consumed
Fires 50% more Arrows per [Charges|Frenzy Charge] consumed
Modifiers to [Projectile] speed apply to arrow landing frequency

skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, making it larger.

stats: Supported Skills have 35% increased Area of Effect

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports [Projectile|Projectile] skills, making them fire extra [Projectile|Projectiles]. Also lowers [Attack] and Cast speed of supported skills, as well as lessening their damage.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: Fire an icy arrow that sprays a cone of ice shards when it hits a target.
skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making it more effective at [Freeze|Freezing] enemies.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.
Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: Leap backwards, firing an icy arrow which can [Chill] or [Freeze] enemies around the location from which you escaped. This arrow will create [IceFragment|Ice Fragments] on impact.
skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

skills.secDescrText: Ready a volley of arrows or spears, [Empowered|Empowering] your next Barrageable [Bow|Bow] or [Projectile] [Spear|Spear] [Attack|Attack] to [Repeat] multiple times. Consumes your [Charges|Frenzy Charges] on use to add additional repeats.

stats: [Empowered] [Attack|Attacks] [Repeat] +2 times, and a further +1 time per Frenzy Charge consumed
560% of repeated Skill's attack time is added to this skill's cooldown, to a maximum of 30 seconds

skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any Skill that [Consume|Consumes] [Charges], granting a chance for benefits of that [Consume|Consumption] to be doubled.

stats: Benefits from consuming [Charges] for Supported Skill have 20% chance to be doubled

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: Ready your active [Bow] or [Spear], [Empowered|Empowering] your next Barrageable [Bow] or [Projectile] [Spear] [Attack|Attacks] to create [IceFragment|Ice Fragments] on [HitDamage|Hit]. This Skill's cooldown can be bypassed by expending a [Charges|Frenzy Charge]. Cannot [Empowered|Empower] [Sustained] Skills.
skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports Skills which [DetonationTime|Detonate] after some amount of time has elapsed, shortening the time before [DetonationTime|Detonation].
socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

skills.secDescrText: Fire an arrow that drops from above, creating a [Lightning|Lightning] burst. The arrow remains in the ground, and any [Chain|Chaining] [Lightning|Lightning] beams can [Chain|Chain] to it. When [Chain|Chained] to, the arrows charge up for a brief period before releasing another [Lightning|Lightning] burst. The Lightning Arrow Skill skips this delay, causing bursts immediately.

stats: Arrow disappears after being [Chain|Chained] to 8 times

skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

skills.secDescrText: [Channelling|Channel] to charge up your bow before releasing a powerful shot. Releasing with [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing] causes the arrow to explode on impact and [Consume] [Freeze] on directly [HitDamage|Hitting]. [Consume|Consuming] [Freeze] or [HitDamage|Hitting] a [HeavyStun|Heavy Stunned] enemy enhances the explosion.

stats: Modifers to [Attack] speed also affect this skill's cost

50% more damage with [HitDamage|Hits] for explosions originating
from a [Rarity|Unique] enemy

skills.descrText: Skills can be managed in the Skills Panel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports [Channelling] skills that have special effects if released with [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing], causing them to deal much more damage if released with [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing] but reducing the [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing] window.

stats: Supported Skills have a 35% shorter [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing] window
Supported Skills deal 35% more Damage when released with [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing]

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal significantly more damage but gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

stats: Supported Skills have a Cooldown of 10 seconds

socketedItems.descrText: Place into a Skill's Support Gem socket in the Skills Panel to apply its effects to that Skill. You cannot have multiple Support Gems of the same Category socketed within one Skill.
